CONTACT.TEXTAREA_TEXT: Enter your message for us here. We will get back to you within 2 business days.

ABOUT.TITLE: Welcome to
ABOUT.TEXT: Need some machine embroidery? We arе eager to cooperate with you. We deal both with retail and wholesale orders. We embroider on any type of clothing, including:  headdresses (hats, caps), jeans, shoes, uniforms, as well as bedding, blankets, clothing, leather items etc. We work with up-to-date machines (brother entrepreneur pro pr 1000e), which are considered to be the best in their class all over the world providing high quality. The designs and logotypes are made with professional embroidery programs. Please, feel free to contact us in case of questions or requirements.

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
FAQ.TEXT_1_2: The price is determined by considering the design, complication, quantity and size of the logotype or picture.
FAQ.TEXT_2_1: How long does it take for the order to be ready?
FAQ.TEXT_2_2: The orders are accomplished in the possible short period due to the new embroidery machines, even on the day of making the order.
FAQ.TEXT_3_1: What kind of pictures must be sent to be appropriate for embroidery?
FAQ.TEXT_3_2: Any picture You send is real to embroider.
